II. Purpose of Addendum
The agency has requested a review of new office space for agency use as a
satellite office. The new office is located just a block away from the main office.
The address is 306 W Michigan, Jackson, MI 49204.
III. Methodology
An on-site review of the new location was conducted on 05/13/19 and 05/30/19.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The office space was reviewed and observed to be a large office space consisting
of numerous offices for staff use on both the main floor and lower basement level.
There is a reception area in the front and a separate entrance in the rear. There
are rooms for dedicated visitation space, meeting/conference rooms, and storage
space. There is locked storage available for confidential information and a
crosscut shredder for disposal of confidential information. The space is suitable to
the purposes of the agency. It is expected that the agency will provide supervision,
on-site, at least 2 days per week, as required in the CPA licensing rules.
V. Recommendation
I recommend no change to the current license status.
